context.rdfs:comment: Used to describe a ticket to an event, a flight, a bus ride, etc.
context.rdfs:label: Ticket

properties.rdfs:comment: The unique identifier for the ticket.
properties.rdfs:label: ticketNumber

properties.rdfs:comment: Reference to an asset (e.g., Barcode, QR code image or PDF) usable for entrance.
properties.rdfs:label: ticketToken

properties.rdfs:comment: The seat associated with the ticket.
properties.rdfs:label: ticketedSeat

properties.rdfs:comment: The date the ticket was issued.
properties.rdfs:label: dateIssued
